author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_1_X` (branch `CMSSW_16_0_X`): 
   * This is the PR for the master branch, which will then be backported down to `15_1_X` (the latter is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development).
   * **This is the close-out development PR in the CMSSW_15_1_X cycle**

These updates correspond to the updates towards the first version "V1.0" of the GRun menu for the 2026 pp data-taking.
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

- [CMSHLT-3675](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3675) [Scouting,MUO] Scouting SingleMuon monitoring path for 2026 pp menu
- [CMSHLT-3707](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3707) [PF,NGT] Persist collections for PF RecHits and Clusters in `HLTDebugFEVT`
- [CMSHLT-3708](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3708) [HIG,TAU] Backup DiTau Trigger for 2026 proton proton Data Taking

In addition this PR introduces the following commit:
   * dc43b1ee3c751e0566bf134a40e6efcaa5511bd7: update `hltPathOwners.json` towards 2026 GRun V1.0

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, it will be backported to `CMSSW_15_1_X` which is the current TSG development cycle.
title: HLT menu development for `15_1_X` (4/N) [`16_1_X`]
